name: Cozy (blackears)
description:
This game was created for the Godot Game Jam #40.  It is currently unfinished, but I'm uploading what I have before the deadline.  The basic story is in place, but a lot of development work still needs to be done on art assets.

This game is designed to be played with either keyboard or a USB Xbox or Playstation controller.

Keyboard:

  • Up/Down/Left/Right - Move character
  • I/J/K/L - Move camera
  • Space - Jump
  • X - Act
  • Z - Cancel

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Joystick - Move character
  • Right Joystick - Move camera
  • A - Jump
  • X - Act
  • B - Cancel
